about_the_game:
Set Out On A Quest to Rule the Ponds!




Fishing with the Homies is a surreal Fishing Simulation Game where you fish your way across several ponds and lakes to catch all of the fish you can! Armed with what could charitably be called a fishing rod, you will hone your angling skills to best each pond’s established fishermen and gather new equipment.

Looting the Waters

However, you can’t catch these fish with just your hands! (Well, some people can, but you never managed to do it.) Instead, your fishing rod, line, reel and bobber will help you conquer the ponds and fish up the wonders of the world!

These fish won’t simply sit there as you real them in, once you have one hooked you’ll need to tire them out before you can reel them in. Pay attention to what direction the fish is trying to swim in and use your Arrow Keys to fight against them. Remember to keep an eye on your line, as they will put a large amount of tension on it as they fight back, and may even snap the line if you aren’t careful.

Fish don’t seem to be the only things in the water though. There are a few shadows in the water that don’t quite look like fish, but it's not clear what they are. Maybe fishing them up as well will help you in some way.


The Lurking Legend

But be warned, young fisher, for not everything is as it seems. While it seems like everything is sunshine and rainbow trout, there is a great darkness that lies just beneath the surface. Perhaps it is your destiny to finally uncover these very reel threats…or maybe you’re out of your depth.
